name: Vampire Hunter (itch)
description:
A short hack and slash roguelike with the goal of killing the evil vampire on the 10th floor of the dungeon. Use items and equipment wisely to dispatch more and more threatening enemies as you near the vampire's lair.

Controls:

WASD - Move
E - Use / equip item
Q - Drop item
X - Ranged Attack
C - Wait
Enter - Use stairs
Space - Pick up
Left Mouse Button - Target
Esc - Pause / Back
